API Reference

Interactive documentation for the KollectNews API.

GET/api/v1/articles

List all published articles with pagination. Redis cached.

Auth: Public

Parameters

NameTypeRequiredDescription
pagenumberNoPage number (default: 1)
pageSizenumberNoItems per page (default: 10)
categorystringNoFilter by category slug

Example

curl -X GET "http://localhost:3000/api/v1/articles?page=1&pageSize=10"

Response

// Click "Try it" to see the response
